thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Great Barbour product and exactly what I was looking for with a good price; however, I appreciate the sizes come direct from the Barbour web site, measurements could be given to save returns and re-order for correct size. Yes, I phoned and the measurements were given over the phone, so the company do know the physical measurement; so why not post this information on the web site; thats because when you phone its a premium rate number so be warned - why?? Costly...
That said the service is very good, so its not really a complaint at all, but a grumble more than anything of where some improvements could be made.
